description: Stops a session for a specified Dev Environment.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment. To obtain this ID, use  ListDevEnvironments.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment session. This ID is returned by  StartDevEnvironmentSession.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment session.
